thread.title: Ex-Bayern Munich star Sammy Kuffour MISSES out on Kotoko job as Otumfuo tells Opoku Nti-led team to continue working
thread.title_full: Ex-Bayern Munich star Sammy Kuffour MISSES out on Kotoko job as Otumfuo tells Opoku Nti-led team to continue working

title: Ex-Bayern Munich star Sammy Kuffour MISSES out on Kotoko job as Otumfuo tells Opoku Nti-led team to continue working
text:
FIFA 2010 Sports News | 14 October 2015 23:25 CET Ex-Bayern Munich star Sammy Kuffour MISSES out on Kotoko job as Otumfuo tells Opoku Nti-led team to continue working - www.ghanasoccernet.com Sammy Kuffour 
Ex-Bayern Munich star Samuel Osei Kuffour has missed out on the Asante Kotoko job after the club's Life Patron Asantehene Otumfuo Osei Tutu II asked the Opoku Nti-led administration to continue working. 
The ex-Ghana defender announced in television interview that Manhyia had given him the job and he would become the club's President. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com Sports News Follow Us I fear what will happen when i dont do it than what will happen when i do it By: SAINT SAM
